type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.GradleTask
type.description: * Represents a task which is executable by Gradle. * * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getProject
method.description: * Returns the Gradle project this task is defined in. * * @return The element. * @since 1.0-milestone-5

property.name: project
property.description: * Returns the Gradle project this task is defined in. * * @return The element. * @since 1.0-milestone-5
